name: Topserialy.to - NO COMMENTS
description: Nearly in every episode below video in comments section is at least one spoiler. So now it is hidden. Plus i deleted sidebar and resized video so now it is centered.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.topserialy.to/") {
#kom {display: none} /*odsranuje nadpis sekce KOMENTARE */
.mk-comments {display: none} /*odsranuje komentare kvuli SPOILERUM */
.sidebar {display: none} /* odstranuje sidebar */
.container .content .obsah, .obsah {width: 1000px;} /* rozsiruje video na pozici sidebaru */
.dpas .komentovat {display: none}  /*odstranuje tlacitko komentovat */
}
